downloadDescription: Microsoft Azure Import/Export tool is the drive preparation and repair tool that you can use with the Microsoft Azure Import/Export Service.
detailsSection:
Microsoft Azure Import/Export tool is the drive preparation and repair tool you can use with the Microsoft Azure Import/Export Service. This tool can be used in several different ways:

• Before you create an Import job, you can use this tool to copy data to the hard drives you are going to ship to a Microsoft Azure data center.
• After an import job has finished, you can use this tool to repair any blobs that were corrupted, missing, or conflicted with other blobs.
• After you receive the drives from an export job, you can use this tool to repair any files that were corrupted or missing on the drives.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 7 or a new Windows OS
Windows 2008 R2 or a newer Windows OS
.Net Framework 4.5.1
installInstructionSection: Detailed instructions can be dowloaded at https://aka.ms/azureimportexport.
